summary: Finance/wallet app with home page, profile page, and per-user QR code features being built.

existing_features.title: Add a FinMate Wallet section to the Home page (frontend/src/pages/Home.tsx) that displays the user's wallet balance, wallet ID (derived from the user's Internet Identity principal), and quick-action buttons for Send and Receive money.
Add a FinMate Wallet section to the Profile page (frontend/src/pages/Profile.tsx) that displays the user's wallet ID, wallet balance, and a button to view the user's unique QR code.

Generate a unique QR code per user based on their Internet Identity principal. The QR code should encode the user's wallet ID/principal string and be displayed in a modal (WalletQRModal) accessible from both the Home and Profile wallet sections. The QR code must be generated client-side using a library (e.g., qrcode.react) so each user sees only their own unique code.

new_feature_requests.summary: Add Fimate wallet section to home page
Add Fimate wallet section to profile page
Generate a separate unique QR code for each user
Add a walletBalance field (Nat, defaulting to 0) to the UserProfile type in the backend (backend/main.mo) to persist and retrieve each user's FinMate wallet balance.
Update useQueries.ts to expose the walletBalance field from UserProfile in the existing profile query hook so the frontend wallet components can read and display it.
